         You grinned. "Don't worry, I'm just a traveler. Just passing through the village." Gaara then turned away from you and walked into the busy road. But not wanting to end the conversation, you followed him.

         Gaara kept looking back, but he didn't say anything. You wondered what he was thinking about. "Why are you following? Don't you know who I am? I could kill you if I wanted to."

         "I know who you are, I just don't care about titles. Your a potential friend. And I like having friends." You smiled goofily. He stopped dead in his tracks, turned around, and looked you directly in the eyes.

"I accept. Thank you, Gaara."

At Gaara's home

She slid her foot downward to take off the slipper, her soft sole rubbing against Joe's forehead. Lilith did the same with her other foot.Then she teased him for a bit by hovering her foot above his face, scrunching her toes. Joe was able to see her purple nail-polished toes and her pale sole with light pink on the ball and the heel of her foot. Joe knew right away that from the combination of the paleness and the pink of her foot meant that her feet were soft, clean, and taken care of.

"You like 'em? They're pretty clean, especially 'cause I just got outta the shower." she explained. Joe nodded without hesitation. Lilith giggled at Joe's approval and rewarded him for it. She pushed her feet onto Joe's cheeks and massaged it by squeezing Joe's cheeks inside her toes. 1433121.content:
"Yes, straight flush!" Maya leapt from her seat and uppercutted the air in victory. "I guess that means I win again!"

You look down at your three of a kind. You were sure that would've won it. You frown. "Quadruple or nothing!"

"Nu-uh! We've already done double or nothing, and triple or nothing. It's time for me to call in what's rightfully mine." With that said she held out her hand. "That'll be $5, 000 please." Her wide grin did nothing to make you feel any better.


You had been visiting Maya in the Kurain Village, working for a national paranormal magazine, writing a special piece on the Kurain Village, and in-between interviewing Maya and the other residents, you were invited to play some poker by Maya. To your surprise she wanted to use real money, but you were in a sporting mood and obliged. It turned out that you were hustled. She's a brilliant poker play, and after your wallet was emptied, your debts became written I.O.Us that double and then tripled in value as your desperate attempt to defeat her continued. But you lost. Again. And now she was calling in your tab. You had no idea what you were going to be able to do. You'd even gambled away the money needed for the trip back home!

"Umm.." You say, shaking your empty wallet onto the round table infront of you. Not even lint fell out of it. There was literally nothing inside it. "That's going to be a problem."

Maya's wide grin faded and she sat back down, thinking. Then suddenly a smirk appearedon her face. She was thinking about something. You gulped. You didn't think you like what she was thinking of. And you were right. "Well, I suppose there is one other way you can repay me."

"How? I'll do it!"

Maya's smirk grew bigger and she suppressed a giggle. "Alright. Get on your knees and crawl under the table..."

"Wha-"

"Just do it."


Slowly you let yourself slide off of your seat and onto your knees. Then you put your hands on the creaky, wooden floor and crawl towards Maya. You feel heat rise to your cheeks as you blush, you're already humiliated and you haven't found out how you're going to repay her yet! You crawl right up to her, marvelling at her long, lovely legs. She certainly is a beautiful woman. You had respectfully kept those kind of thoughts to the back of your mind while around her, but at her feet, right in front of her, you can't resist thinking it. You raise your head to take a look at the treasure above the legs when you hit your head on the table. "Oww!"

"Aww, did you hurt your head?" Your hear her giggle and she looks under the table at you and smiles, a smile that makes you want to melt like butter.

"So what did you want me down here for anyway, Maya?"

"Well, now that you're down on your knees under the table." As she sat this, she kicked off the flip flops that she always wore. "I want you to have a little chit chat with my feet!"

You stare at her feet. The one body part you didn't have in mind when you thought of her 'that' way. To any foot fetishist, this would be an absolute fantasy, as they were absolutely beautiful feet. But you didn't exactly have a foot fetish. And quite frankly, you thought that Maya's feet didn't smell all that fresh.

"Err, what exactly do you mean by.. Chit chat with your feet?"

Maya giggled. "Silly, I mean I want you to..."
1433121.title: She dominates you

14331212.content:
"...lick them? Maya, you can't be serious!"

Hearing your response, Maya just giggles--and despite the situation, you have to admit it's a very cute laugh. "Of course I am, silly! You're in my debt, and you have to do what I say to work it off if you don't have the money. My little piggies haven't had a good scrub since Phoenix visited... Um... That was..." You could just envision her scratching the side of her head and blinking as she often does when she is deep in thought; unfortunately, the sight of her horrific feet block your vision of her cute mannerisms. Even more unfortunate is the realization that just hit you.

"Weren't you just saying that he hasn't been by in over a month? And does Phoenix Wright, the Turnabout Terror, really scrub his assistant's feet? I find that very difficult to believe."


Another cute laugh, this time punctuated by a not-so-cute (to you, at least) wiggle of the toes. You flinch backwards, but only manage to hit your head on the table. Your loud exclamation of pain only makes Maya laugh even harder and start to inch her toes closer to your face. The smell of dirt, sweat, and, worryingly, some sort of cheese assault your nostrils and make you forget completely about the headache you'll have in the morning.


"Yeah, that's right! Nick has had a bunch of cases recently, so he hasn't had much time to come out for a friendly visit. And you're right--he's too much of an old man to actually enjoy licking my feet, but he has no choice. He's always as broke as you are. He may be a lot better than you at poker, but I'm still good enough to beat him every time--thank the Samurais he's a lawyer and not a professional poker player! Anyway, I write my contracts so tightly that even he couldn't defend himself if he tried to welch, so he usually chit chats with my feet quite a bit. We don't have showers or stuff out here in Kurain, so that's all the love they get, though."

Your face has gone white with fear at this point. Maya's feet were indeed as filthy as they seemed--they hadn't been scrubbed in a month! And you now remember the large contract Maya had you sign before the game--if Phoenix Wright, Loophole Legend, couldn't get out of it, then what chance do you have? You decided one last plea is the only thing you have up your sleeve.

"Maya. Listen to me, now. You and Phoenix are close, so I guess it's okay if you do this to him. But we just met a little while ago. While I do consider you a friend and admire you, this is still wrong. You can't do this to me. I'll repay you in some other way."

Ominous silence. You can't see Maya's face, but her feet are frozen in place. For a moment, at least; she starts quickly clapping them together, the sound of which is almost as deafening as her laughter. Uh-oh.

"I can, and I will! You signed the contract. If you welch... Well, let's just say that I know a few good lawyers! My tootsies are lonely... It's okay that you don't know them well yet because you'll know them VERY well after this little chit-chat. Now, start licking--start with the soles and save the toes for last, please!"

You now know what it's like to be cornered by one of the Wright & Co. Law Agency. With Maya's feet approaching your face, you...
14331212.title: Pursuit: Cornered!

143312121.content:
You steel yourself and decide to face the approaching monsters head-on. You'd have welched if given the chance, but you've been caught in a snare--better to man up and go out with honor than to weakly delay the inevitable. Besides, being honorable might lead to lesser punishment, right?

So your tounge comes out of your mouth with the speed of a striking snake and makes a loud "SLURP" as it connects with Maya's filthy right sole. You drag it across the entire length of the demon: then, before your brain can even process it's taste, smell, or Maya's sigh, you let loose another slurp on the left foot. Your heroism finally expired, you draw back and the aftermath of your actions hits you.

The first thing you notice is the smell. You thought it was bad when Maya was teasing you earlier? When yor nose got closer and your saliva came in contact with the filth, it became far worse. You have a childhood memory of when your high school bully forced your head into a toilet; the smell than was far more pleasent than what you could smell right now. Words can not describe how revolted it makes you feel.

On the other hand, the taste is a mixed bag. At first it felt like you had gotten a vomit-flavored jellybean, but the aftertaste made you reconsider. Something--you guessed it was Maya's sweat---have the luck a very salty aftertaste. It was not unlike eating a pretzel--and pretzels are among your favorite foods. All in all, the drawbacks of the dirty first lick outweigh the glorious aftertaste, but there is something else you must consider.

Maya is in her glory. Her moans are more heavenly than even the sound of her giggles. You can tell that even the first two slurps a have made the night for her; she's so cute, so charming that you want to make her entire life, if you can.

All in all, you're left with a dilemma: are you actually starting to LIKE this? The smell is terrible and the taste a mixed bag, but does the joy of pleasing this beautiful girl outweigh that? Confused, you continue to repay the bargain. Your tounge alternates between her left and right feet. You spend the better part of ten minutes cleaning off the soles, then you move on to the arches and the heel. Maya's moans turn to light giggles as your tounge dances across her arches; it's only more musical to your ears than the moans.

"Ahahaha...ahhhh. Take a break for a minute please." You stop, relief and disappointment competing for your primary emotion. "You're doing amazing... Nick always is slacking off and trying to get out of it by now, but you're getting better as you go along." She wiggled her toes quite cutely---hold it, what?-- and asked, "are you enjoying this?"

Good question. Um... What's your answer? It's tough to think over the rancid stench emitting from her tootsies.
143312121.title: So it begins...

choices: Food, silly!  It's time for your dinner!
1433121211.content:
"I... it's strange, but I'm actually really e-en-enjoying this, Maya. Y-you seem so happy t-that I can't help it. If you want me to go on, I... I'd be delighted," you stammer.

Maya unleashed a squeal even louder than the one when she first met Will Powers, then grew very serious. "I understand. Some people think that this fetish is strange, but I don't feel that way at all. I understand if you want to keep this a secret--I'm not Detective Gumshoe, I can hold it in. I have to ask, though... what exactly do you enjoy about it?"

You pause for a second and steady yourself. She doesn't think that you're weird; no one else will ever know about this. It's okay to be honest here. "Like I said, I really love your reaction. I can't even see your face right now, but just the sounds you make and the way you scrunch those cute toes... it's just paradise, you know? And now that all of the grime is off, your feet are so soft and squishy. But best of all is the taste... I never want to eat again, because food just can't compare."

"Maya was quiet throughout your entire speech; her right heel slowly tapped against the ground. You take an (accurate) guess and assume that she's blushing. She says, "You know, you are the cutest thing ever. Well, except for Pearly, but you're close. Anyway, I'm going to take a quick break to run and go get something to make the rest of the night better for the both of us... I'm not ready for my toe treatment yet, so I'm going to get a toy. Something old man Nick would never agree to... Anyway..." Maya's feet leave the underside of the table and come back dangling her sandles. "You can have these while I go and get a few toys. Bye-bye for now!"

Maya wiggles her toes at you in a cute farewell, then leaves the room . Ironically, you miss her cute feet already--a half hour ago, you couldn't stand them, but now you love them so. You decide to investigate her sandals while she's gone, but it's only a halfhearted attempt... they only hold a slight fraction of her delectable taste and overpowering smell. What is it that Maya is carrying?
1433121211.title: Announce the Truth-- You LOVE Them!

14331212111.content:
Maya sits back in her chair; this time, however, she plops her feet on top of the table. "I'm really sorry," she apologizes, "that you hand to start off down there under that cramped table. I was afraid you'd fight back, so I needed you in a position where I could control you. But now that you've admitted that you can't get enough of my little tootsies... Well, you ought to come up here where you can enjoy them better." Maya's voice is cheery and far more playful than before.

You have no objections to getting up off of the floor; you rise and bang your head on the table again. Ouch. Maya notices your pain and offers to "help rub your little boo-boo with her magic-wagic soles;" once again, you have no objections. You sit down opposite Maya and lie your head down on the table between you. Maya's feet rub up against the back of your head, your cheeks, and even pop into your mouth. It's a heavenly experience; no massage you've ever had before can compare, and you find your headache being replaced by the soft coolness of her soles. Maya's baby talk completes the whole experience for you; she constantly teases and tantalizes you.

Finally, she says, "In order to complete 'the spell' and make your ouchie finally disappear, pucker up and just give each of my feet one big smooch." You do as she says and realize--at this point, the pain really has went away. She giggles at your expression and says, "Now that you're better, it's time for what I brought you up here for." She hands you a jar of honey. "This is some of the best honey in the world. I have Nick import it from across the country for me. He cringes at the price, but it's worth it. I put it on all of my burgers."

You're a bit perplexed at where this is going, so you ask, "That's all well and fine, but what's that have to do with me?"

She gives you a knowing smile. "C'mon, isn't it obvious? You 're going to eat it... Off of my feet, of course. You admitted how good they taste on their own, but this should make them even better. Trust me, I speak from experience!"

You love honey. It's possibly your favorite treat, and the kind she's offering you is the most expensive out there. Poor Mr. Wright. You quickly thank her, but something strikes you as odd and you chime in, "you speak from experience? What do you mean?"

Her cheeks flash a bright red and her eyes go wide; she's cornered and she knows it. She quickly takes the defensive. "Hey, this is great stuff, okay! When it spills, I still can't let it go to waste... Even that time it spilled on Pearly's feet... Anywho," she quickly changes the topic, "It's time for your dinner!" She upends the jar on the table, plays around in it with her feet (what a beautiful sight--the honey slowly dripping from her succulent suckers makes you swallow in anticipation), then sticks the dripping, sticky things in your face.

You attack the feet with zeal, with gusto. She's right--her feet and the honey are the perfect combination! You lick clean her soles, then suck on her heels as if they were lollypops. Of course, no lollipop could compare in terms of sweetness, softness, or size. And no lollipop could make the beautiful groans that were coming from Maya's mouth.

You have no time to rest, however--honey is dripping off of her arches! You quickly attack them with furious nibbles. At this point, you're in too much bliss to realize that Maya is giggling like crazy and is enjoying herself even more than you are.

But the best is still to come, as you finally turn to the area that's been foreign to you the entire night: the toes. Maya's toes are simply beautiful. They're dripping with honey and still caked in dirt (she had said she wanted you to save them for last earlier, and you hadn't gotten to them). You start by kissing each one; the spirit medium starts moaning in anticipation and pleasure. After you kiss them all, you move up to sucking each and every one of them. You spend at least a minute per toe; starting by inhaling the honey and dirt, you quickly move in to nibble the delectable edges and lick all of the dirt from inbetween them.

Oh, the taste! Maya's dirty soles tasted great; her clean, honey coated arches better; but her dirty, sticky toes were by far the best. You'd died and gone to Heaven and so had she; though her moans were pleasent before, they were constant now. Honestly, it was the best experience either of you ever had.

Eventually, her toes were clean as well. You note that beneath all the grime was the sexiest light purple polish that complemented her tanned skin quite nicely. The two of you break down into foot games; you play this little piggy as she playfully tells untouched that you missed spots and wiggles her divine toes around.

With the evening quickly winding down in such a way, you decide that it's..

1433122.content:
The company I work for was working on some computer effects for an upcoming cinema movie based on a samurai series. After finishing the project all employees, including those who helped (like our company) received free tickets for the movie. I wasn't particularly interested in this kind of stuff despite the fact that I was part of the project so I decided that I should just sell my tickets online. The city isn't too big so I don't own a car. I try to walk home or to work whenever I can to get my exercise.

On my way back home I saw a huge line of people standing in front of the ticket booth. I was surprised when I saw that they were buying the tickets for the "Scrap Samurai: The Warrior of Neo Olde Scrapyard".

"This movie is actually popular?" I thought out loud. "I might be able to get a lot more out of this ticket than I imagined." And just when I thought my luck couldn't get any better, I saw the clerk at the ticket booth putting up a sign on the window that read "TICKETS FOR NEW SAMURAI MOVIE ARE SOLD OUT. Sorry for the inconvenience." Most of the people in line started walking away in disappointment. I could hear the complaints and moans from a distance.

"Hey Mister!" I heard from behind. When I turned around I saw a girl with long black hair. She was dressed in some kind of purple shrine maiden dress. It was revealing most of her long, smooth legs. "Did you just say that you have a ticket for the movie that just sold out?" She asked

"Y-yeah, I got one" I said. Her face immediately illuminated as she put on a big smile. I should stop thinking out loud, I said to myself.

"Could you give it to me? PLEEEEEASE?" She asked with puppy eyes. "I'll do anything!"

"Huh. Anything...?" I thought about it for a moment. I couldn't help but glance down at her feet. She was wearing flip-flops. Her toenails had a french manicure with some little white flower designs.
I found myself staring at them. She didn't seem to care. The girl probably thought i was looking down in thought, but I could tell from my peripheral vision that she was getting impatient.



PS:Sorry for bad English at times.

[edited by HellaPinoy]

14331221.content:
Thinking that you would like to actually see how a date would play out, you decided to ask for her phone number. "I wasn't planning on using it anyway, so sure, you can have it."

Maya leapt up in what you assumed to be pure joy. "Wow, thank you sir!" Her smile was absolutely dazzling, and her eyes seemed to have a sparkle to them. You almost didn't want to add your minor stipulation, simply because it might put a damper on her good mood. Almost.

"Now, before I hand it over I would like one thing from you. Well two, really. First, my name is blank so no need for sir anymore. I hate when people call me that, too formal. Second, and most importantly, I would love it if you would give me your phone number."

Maya's good mood did not seem to falter in the least, although she did look a tad confused. "Sure blank, but why? My number I mean, not the sir thing. I can understand that."

"Well, I would like to go out some time and standing around outside the theater until I see you does not seem like the brightest idea. I would offer to buy you dinner, but the movie starts in about five minutes so..."

Maya seems to become even more overjoyed than before, if that is even possible. "Wow, movie tickets and an offer of dinner! You really know the way to a girls heart, huh? Well of course you can have my number. Keep playing your cards right, and you may never get rid of me!" That last statement was made with a chuckle and playful wink. She quickly pulled out a business card, with her name and contact information. It is also marked with her profession as well, something about being the master of a village. It would explain the weird outfit.

After passing you the card, a voice called out from the theater. It announced that the last showing of the movie was about to begin. "Oh no, I better hurry! Call me later blank!" And with that she was gone. Although her image was still burnt into your mind, from her adorably odd hair to her perfect toes.

143332222.content: Supposedly a sleepyhead, Cammy Meele is a rude and lazy flight attendant, a member of an international smuggling organization, a murderer in one of the cases, and extremely cute!
143332222.title: Murderous Ms. Cammy Meele?

1433322221.content:
My name is Miles Edgeworth. I am a prosecutor currently on a three-story airplane in First Class from Borginia. Starting from the bottom level is the cargo, then the lounge, and then the passengers seats. Due to unexpected turbulence, I was knocked unconcious in the lounge. When I woke up, I found everything in disarray, with grape juice spilled on the floor and glass shattered around the elevator. But when I opened the elevator to head upstairs, I was greeted by a fresh corpse sitting at my feet. After having the flight attendant Ms. Rhoda Teneiro suspect me of being the murderer, I calmed her down and proved my innocence. Being a prosecutor, I found it to be my obligation to hunt down the real murderer, starting with clues. Tracks led me to the plane's shop that Ms. Teneiro attends to. Unfortunately, Ms. Teneiro supposedly lied when she told me that the captain granted her permission to escort me around the shop and lounge, as pointed out by the other flight attendant Ms. Cammy Meele....

"That's a lie, Rhoda...." said Cammy Meele.
"What is?" Rhoda replied.
"The captain never gave you permission to escort Mr. Edgeworth to the shop."
"Yes he did! I just came from the cockpit!"
"Do you really want me to prove you wrong? I can go to him right now and ask if he granted you that permission." Knowing that what Ms. Cammy said was true, Ms. Rhoda did not argue any further.
"Instead, I'll be the one escorting you, Mr. Edgeworth. Rhoda, you go back upstairs and do your job or whatever."

As Rhoda Teneiro walked back up the stairs, Ms. Meele turned her attention back to me. "So where were we....? Ooooh yeah. You wanted to inspect the shop, riiight?"
"If I may?" I said to her.
"Well what're you waiting for? I'll be right behind you. But don't you dare think you're off the hook. I still think you're the one who did it."

I decided to not reply to her remark. I continued my investigation of the shop. The broken glass from the cabinet indicated that something from inside busted its way out during the turbulence. Furthermore, there was grape juice found on the wheel of one of the suitcases. I pointed it out to Ms. Meele.

"Do you see this?" I told her. "The murderer must've used this luggage to transport the victim from the shop to the elevator!"
".......zzzz........." she snored.
I snapped my fingers in front of her face. She had fallen asleep, still standing up and still holding that teddy bear of hers. I called her name out loud.
"MS. CAMMY MEELE!" I said quite loudly.
".......huh......whaaa.....?" She said as she woke up, rubbing her eyes.
"Please stay awake while on the job." I lectured her. "This is a crime scene and the murderer is definitely nearby, so we must both be very vigilant."
"Ok....Mr......Prosecutor......" she managed to say before falling back asleep.

I gave up trying to talk to her and continued my work. I squatted down to further inspect the luggage that had grape juice on the wheel. The other luggage had a stopper on the wheels so it would not move during the turbulence, and yet the luggage with grape juice on it managed to stay in place during the turbulence even without stoppers.

But just as I found that out, something hit me in the back of the head with incredible force. I was knocked nearly unconscious, laying on the floor. A few seconds later, I felt two soft fingers press against my throat.

"Hmph. You're still alive." said a familiar female voice. "I'll have to hide you somewhere before finishing you off...." That was all I was able to hear before everything turned black and I fell into unconsciousness.
1433322221.title: The Investigation

14333222211.content:
I had woken up on the floor again, but this time was very different. I was woken up by a hand lightly slapping my face. I was gagged by some type of cloth and my body was tied by rope, with my hands taped together behind my back. When I opened my eyes I saw Ms. Cammy Meele looking down at me from the foot of a bed. She had both of her feet on my chest to keep me on the ground.

"Hah! You like the taste of sweaty flight attendant socks in your mouth?" she mocked at me. I tried to spit it out but found out that my mouth was also taped. She grabbed the end of the tape and pulled it off. A muffled shout came out of me. I then tried again to spit it out, but Cammy pressed her bare foot on my mouth. She shook her index finger and smiled her lazy smile.

"Keep it in your mouth. It belongs in there." she said before releasing her foot from my mouth. I spit it out and coughed.
"What's the meaning of this?!" I exclaimed.
"What do you mean, 'what's the meaning of this?' " she teased. "Are you telling me that you don't belong down there, under the feet of the true murderer?"
I could not believe my ears. Here I am, at the mercy of Cammy Meele, the murderer. I knew that the possibility of me escaping was less than zero percent. According to her, I should've been dead when she struck me at the shop.

"Do you honestly think I would let anyone find out? You're the only one on this plane who even had a chance of finding out. The best thing to do now is to... get rid of you."
"But why?" I asked. "Why did you need to kill him in the first place?"
"Weeeelll...." she began. "It's pretty similar to your situation. He was snooping around in the cargo and almost found out about the smuggling operations we've been doing here. Sooo.... I pushed him off the stairs then carried his body in one of those hideous luggages that Rhoda designed and brought him up using the elevator."
I sighed. I knew that since we were all on a plane and no one can escape, she would have to place the blame on someone else until we reach the airport. Who better than either me or Rhoda?
I snapped back into my current situation and thought that the least I can do now is stall until we get to the airport. I would then have a slightly better chance, if any, to escape Cammy Meele's clutches.

"I see no point in killing me, Ms. Meele..." I began to reason. "You wouldn't want more blood on your hands, now would you?" She was silent for a tad bit, for my logic seemed to influence her.
"Hmph. You prosecutors...." she began as she smothered me with her toes and the ball of her foot at my mouth. "So you're saying that we're supposed to pretend as if nothing happened? I didn't kill that damn interpol agent or kidnap you? How would I know that once I let you step out of this plane that you wouldn't tell anyone else what I did? Prosecutors and lawyers like you are so obsessed with getting to the truth and bringing justice to us criminals. Oh no no no, Mr. Edgeworth. I'm afraid you're not going anywhere. I'll never let you out of my hands.... and feet. *heh heh heh* "

It was hopeless. It didn't seem like she'll be showing mercy anytime soon. Having my face used as a murderer's foot rag didn't make things any better either. I decided to stick to my original plan to kill time before we arrive at the airport. But who knows how long that would be?
14333222211.title: Prisoner

143332222111.content:
If I were to stay alive long enough to reach the airport, and keep Ms. Meele occupied so she doesn't try to cover her tracks, I had no choice but to plead and beg for her cooperation. Normally I wouldn't even think of stooping so low, especially to a criminal, but under these circumstances, not only my life, but the conviction of the rightful murder depended on it. With only Ms. Meele as my witness, I swallowed my pride, and began to submit.

"Ms. Meele, please reconsider. If you let me go, I will do everything in my power to give you the lightest sentence possible."
"Oh please, you're not fooling anyone. If I take my sights off you for one minute, you'll blow this murder right into the open and take me straight into court."
It was no use. She's in the best scenario for her, no amount of bargaining would cause her to sway.
"Now that you're mine, you can say goodbye to prosecuting for good. Maybe I should pick your new life for you. Hmm..."
That sinister look on her face as she pondered, I had a feeling this would be going from bad to worse.

"From now on Mr. Edgeworth, you're going to be my eternal foot slave!"
"That's... insane!" I exclaimed. "I wouldn't dream of complying!"
"You don't have a choice. You gave up that right as soon as you fell into my hands."
"Grrrr..."
"As my foot slave, you will massage my feet, give me pedicures, kiss my arches, lick my soles, suck on my toes, and when I'm not around, I will lock you in my closet and you will smell my shoes until I come back for you."
I couldn't believe it. Until this plane landed, she could do whatever she wanted with me, and I'd be powerless to resist. And unless a miracle happens, it would be this way for the rest of my life!

"Now my foot slave, I want you to start by..."
143332222111.title: Plead

1433322221112.content:
She stopped mid-sentence, which only made me more tense. She took one foot off my chest, and reached over to the side to hook one of her white leather shoes with her big toe. As she dangled her shoe over my face, I began to notice a change in the atmosphere. No, wait. Not atmosphere. It was an odd smell, and it appeared to be emanating from her shoe. It was faint, so I began to study it more. I closed my eyes, took a deeper whiff, and immediately regretted my decision. It was vile, putrid. The repulsing odor of what seemed to be an unpleasant combination of vinegar and expired cheese made me drive my head back as far into the floor as I could.

Ms. Meele began to speak.
"Did you get a nice preview?"
I shook my head.
"Well..." she replied. "You just need to experience it full on." As soon as she finished, she grabbed her shoe in her hand, and rammed the opening into my face, my nose exposed to the rancid stench dwelling inside. I wouldn't dream of voluntarily taking in more of the smell, so I tried to breathe in through my mouth. She had forseen this, and pushed her right foot over my mouth, sealing my lips shut.

"Ah ah ah!" she said, imitating my finger wag in front of me in a mocking yet powerful gesture. "You're my slave now, so you must do whatever I want. And I want you to smell, so take a nice big whiff before I make you!"

She wasn't going to let me breathe, so I had no choice. I braced myself, and took a whiff. The smell was ten times as strong as before! It was unbearable, having to smell it, but the torture did not end past the nostrils. I could feel the cheesy stench circulating through my body! With each and every moment I spent smelling this awful odor, I could feel my body giving in, my willpower slowly draining.

"I hope you like it, I worked really hard to get it to smell this nice."
Her commentary was not helping, but I couldn't interject in this condition, so she went on.
"We staff have a few pairs of shoes for each flight, but I just love the pearly white color of these shoes so much, I wear these all the time! I've been walking back and forth in these shoes ever since I started working here, and at 10,000 ft in the air, it gets awfully stuffy inside. To think, I've been walking in these for years, and now you have the pleasure of being the only man who gets to smell them! Aren't you lucky?"

Lucky is far from the word I would use to describe it.
Ack! I had been listening to her story to try and take the focus away from the smell, that I hadn't been trying to resist the toll it's taken on my body! Before I knew it, the smell had gotten inside my head, and each of my muscles had lost all energy to move! I could feel myself on the brink of passing out. The smell was too much for me to handle, and I could black out at any second!

Just as I was about to give in, I noticed the smell rapidly fading. Ms. Meele had taken the shoe away. What would make her decide to give me mercy was something I could only speculate. Did she want me to stay awake? Did she have something else in mind? Something much more humiliating?

She brushed her long brunette hair behind her, and leaned in close.
"I've given you a taste of pleasure, now it's your turn to please me."
1433322221112.title: The aroma of submission

14333222211121.content:
She started fidgeting with her shoe, raised both of her feet above my head, and said in a stern commanding tone,
"Stick out your tongue."
I didn't want my tongue anywhere near her, especially the part shadowing over me. I held my tongue, and kept my lips pressed shut.
She responded. "Or perhaps you'd like another session with my shoes, hmm?" dangling her shoe over me and slowly moving it closer.
She had me cornered. The last thing I wanted was to be stuck underneath her shoe again, having to suffer from the smell at such intensity.
Defeated, I laid my tongue out for her.
"Good boy", she said. "Now, my soles are so tired, they want a massage."
I took my tongue back to speak. "To do that, you would have to take off my handcuffs."
"Not from your hands, silly. From your tongue. Now, stick it out."
I swallowed in fear, and laid my tongue out flat.

She pressed her right sole flat against my tongue. As soon as I felt the sweat on her sole connect with my tongue, I tried to retreat, though she had pinned my tongue into my chin. Her foot sweat smelt just as bad, though fortunately it wasn't as strong as being trapped inside her shoe. The taste was... peculiar, to say the least. It was; warm, slimy, but surprisingly, not the worst thing to have come from this woman. If anything, I could consider this a break between what could be worse forms of torment and torture in store for me. It would be tolerable, if it wasn't for me having noticed her rubbing her toes all over my cravat with her other foot.

She lifted her right foot, hovering slightly over my mouth. She commanded me to lick, and not to tempt her into doing something more punishable, I complied. I stuck out my tongue and reached for the heel end of her sole. As the tip of my tongue got a taste of her foot sweat, I moved my tongue up along her sole. As I did, I heard moaning coming from her. It was a moan of pleasure, of arousal. A smooth gentle sounding "mmmm". Just hearing it put my body and mind at ease. Perhaps it was because she was turning docile, or maybe...

"Keep going." Her command interrupted my train of thought. I continued to lick her sole, moving my tongue up and down, gently caressing her skin. As I went on, I heard more moans coming from her, and I could taste more of her foot sweat on my tongue. I never thought I would say it, but I think I began to find the taste quite... nice. It must have lasted about ten or fifteen minutes, before she raised her foot out of reach.

She spoke again, sounding a tad bit flustered. "Nice work, slave. I didn't think you'd have it in you."
Before, a compliment from a woman like this would've slid right off my back. Though I somehow found myself, pleased to hear this from her. Perhaps I was starting to grow accustomed to this new lifesty-
NO! I must not submit to this! I am trying to keep her occupied until the plane starts to land, where I will find my chance to escape. I must stay focused on my mission, and hope this will all end soon.

"What's on your mind? What are you thinking so deeply about?"
Uh oh, I think she might be onto me.
"Well, I hope it's about me. Since I'm your world now. I'm your everything. But enough talk..."
14333222211121.title: Lick my feet

143332222111212.content:
"Open wide!"
I opened my mouth on command, and before I knew it, she had plunged her right foot into my mouth! I could feel her toes wiggling against my tongue, she was enjoying this.
"I want you to rub your tongue all over my toes. I know how good you are with your tongue, so I want you to cover every single corner."

I continued to follow orders, and rubbed my tongue on her toes. The skin on her toes were just as soft as her soles, if not more. From her moans, I could tell that she was easily pleased by rubbing my tongue on the underside of her toes.
"Don't forget to lick between the toes as well."
Her tone of voice had changed. She wasn't quite as stern as before, she seemed to be too caught up in enjoying this that she's become less strict. As her commands started sounding more gentle, it didn't feel quite as humiliating having to submit to such a figure.

As I licked in between her toes, I could feel the natural pressure between the toes of each side. She wasn't clenching, but the thought that she might at any moment and crush my tongue in the process crossed my mind. Nevertheless, I carried on. The sweat between her toes were thicker than the coating under her sole, especially between her big toe and index toe. As I carved out the sweat, she let out a particularly loud and memorable moan.
She moved her other foot from my chest, and started caressing my face with her left sole. Her sole was still rich in sweat, and the smell started to cling to my skin, making the stench linger, and breathing through my nose more difficult.

She lifted her foot out of my mouth, but stopping just short of her big toe. She started plunging her big toe down and up, using my lips to massage the sides of her toe. During this motion, I realized that she was dragging me along through every moment, and despite her softened voice making her appear more vulnerable, she was still in full control, and she could have been messing with my head the entire time. I began to doubt if I would ever find an opportunity to take advantage and escape, but as long as I can make it to the end of the flight with her still in my sights, someone would be bound to walk into the cargo hold, discover her abusing a passenger and have her arrested on the spot. I had my plan in mind at this point, but before I could further develop the idea, I noticed that she had removed her toe from my mouth.

"You have that look again. I can see it in your eyes. What are you thinking?"
How can she read me so well?
"I think you're missing something. I know what you want."
143332222111212.title: The taste of defeat

choices: Resist! Fight on and stay awake!
1433322221112121.content:
On that note, with her left foot, she grabbed my nose in-between her big toe and index toe. The smell was even fouler coming from her toes! She had also pinched the top of my nose with the tip of her toes, and kept my mouth closed with her other foot, forcing me to breathe deeply through the nose.
"You're aching for my foot smell, I can tell. Now you get to smell it up close and personal. Enjoy, sweetie!"
I had hoped this moment wouldn't come. I couldn't take it in lightly like this. I inhaled as deeply as I could, and the smell rushed through my entire body! She kept my nose smothered until I could barely handle it, making me want to beg for mercy. She would let go momentarily to tease me, before trapping me again.

"You love it, the smell soaring through you, telling you to submit to me. Your eyes flicker when you sniff it, you want me so bad."
I was too exhausted to reply coherently. The smell of her feet had beaten me savagely from the inside, I could barely make a complete sentence.
"Well, if you're a good slave, I just might let you smell my feet as much as you want. You'll dream of my feet every night, and live your dreams every day. If I were you, slave, I'd be grateful to devote my entire life to such a beautiful woman."

These comments were ringing in my mind more than anything else she had said. Who knows how long it had been? I couldn't think straight, the only thing I could think of was the smell of her feet. I began to lose hope, there may not be any way out of this, and I probably will have to submit to a life with Ms. Meele.

As I closed my eyes in defeat, a miracle slapped me in the face. I heard an echoing voice, one that was not the voice of Ms. Meele.

"Attention ladies and gentlemen. Please return to your seats, the plane will be arriving in California shortly."

It was Ms. Teneiro! And the announcement was my chance! Any moment now, she would head towards the cargo hold to prepare the luggage for drop-off. As soon as she walks in and keeps Ms. Meele distracted, I will be able to right myself and get up onto my feet. This torture session of Ms. Meele's would soon be over, and she would be behind bars for good. My final move would be complete. I looked up at Ms. Meele to see her reaction to the announcement.

She was flustered, as to be expected, but she brushed it off rather quickly. For a moment, she didn't say a word. The expression on her face was different. She gave an expression of determination. Then before I knew it, she has covered my nose again between her toes and blocked my mouth. The smell once again seeped into my body, causing each part of my body to shut down as I suffered. I figured out what she was trying to do. This time, she was trying to make me black out!

If I fell unconscious now, I would lose my chance to escape! I had to hold on as long as possible, and fight off this strong odor. I tried to struggle, but her feet kept me pressed against the floor.
"I know what you're up to, and you're not getting away from me that easily! I'll make sure you never leave my sights! Now, give in to my feet."
The smell was surging through me, poisoning me, keeping me subdued. With every moment I try to resist, the smell keeps me pinned and seduces each of my muscles to give in.
"Fall asleep for me now, my slave, and be with me forever, forever under my feet."
1433322221112121.title: The fight for freedom

14333222211121212.content:
The smell this time was too much, I couldn't stay awake. The odor was overpowering me, and I was helpless to resist its power. Everything was starting to get dark. The last thing I saw was Ms. Meele lean towards my face, close enough for her long bushy hair to tickle my cheeks a little, speak her last words.
"Good night, my slave."
And with that, everything went black.

When I awoke, I felt myself trapped. I saw nothing but darkness. I was no longer handcuffed and I was free to move my arms slightly in front of me. I felt like I was trapped in a rectangular shaped box. I felt around, and concluded that I was trapped in a suitcase. I let out a sigh, that I had lost my chance for freedom. Breathing in through my nose, I noticed the smell of Ms. Meele's feet was back, and as strong as ever. I felt around, and found her shoes on my lap. The putrid smell was even worse, because I was trapped in a small space, and none of the smell would escape. I was trapped with her shoes, the stench filling the entire suitcase with a thick layer that I couldn't take my mind off.

I suddenly felt a giant shock, followed by rumbling. These movements triggered my inner-most fears. While I figured it was the suitcase being moved, the nudges simulated one of the most horrific moments of my life. I felt my spine freeze up, my legs going numb, and my head flashing with images of the nightmare of my past, which has plagued me ever since it happened. The tremors felt like I was trapped within the Earth during an earthquake, this was more intense than any other earthquake I had fallen to, and it wasn't ending.

This nightmare has been haunting me for long enough! I had to take my mind off it, not let it control me anymore! It was pitch black, there was nothing to focus on, other than the shoes that were thrown into the suitcase along with me. I never wanted to stick my nose inside her shoes again, but the tremors were too unbearable. I took a deep breath, grabbed her shoe, and buried my face into it. I inhaled as deep as I possibly could, and let her foot smell seep into my body. The scent was pure toxic, and my body once again started submitting to the smell once again.

It was working! Before long, the tremors began to fizzle away until I stopped feeling it. As I continued to immerse myself in her foot smell, the strangest feeling opened up inside me. I began to feel, dare I say... comforted, by the smell. The powerful cheesy vinegary scent started to become addicting, and I found myself forcing my nose deeper into her shoe, and caressing the leather with my hands. Even if I wanted to, I never wanted to stop smelling her shoes.

Like a drug addict obsessed with their substance, I had to inhale more of that aroma. Every time I took a deep smell of her shoes, my body felt more and more relaxed. I clung onto her shoes with all my life. I was in a moment of complete serenity and bliss. While I was in my own world, the tremors stopped, and I only just picked up a faint sound of unzipping. Light suddenly burst into the suitcase and I tumbled out from the back, still clutching onto her shoes. Looking up, I saw Ms. Meele, standing over me.

"I'm glad to see you liked my little present. I had to change into a different pair of shoes, but you deserved it after all the lovely work you did on my feet. You make a great foot slave."
I looked around, and saw a giant window, light pouring into the room. Pink carpets, wallpaper and bedsheets, I concluded that I was in Ms. Meele's bedroom.
"Take a good look, this is where you will spend the rest of your life."
She walked over to a closed closet door, and told me to look. As she opened the door, I saw stacks and stacks of shoes.
"This will be your room, slave. When I have to go, you will stay here, and lick all of my shoes clean. I'll make sure they smell nice and sweaty, just for you."

She walked back over to her bed, and sat down at the foot of it.
"I hope you liked your trial as my foot slave, because from now on you'll be spending all eternity worshiping my feet."
All my doubts about being her slave, and all the time I spent plotting my escape turned out to be in vain. It would've been better spent giving into my new mistress. But now I can spend the rest of my life making up for my mistake. My destiny was not to become a prosecutor, it was to spend my life groveling to the woman most deserving of pampering and worshiping. And now I will devote my life to making sure Cammy Meele would always be loved.
These were my thoughts as I lowered my head under her feet, for what would be the second time of many to come.
